components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Issue with OTP Codes not Sent to Customers Registering for A2P Sole Prop Brands

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing an issue with OTP Codes not Sent to Customers Registering for A2P Sole Prop Brands. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide an update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with OTP Codes not Sent to Customers Registering for A2P Sole Prop Brands. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

The BTC network in Bahamas is conducting an emergency maintenance from 11 January 2024 at 20:00 PST until 11 January 2024 at 20:40 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to BTC Bahamas handsets.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 January 2024 at 22:00 PST until 12 January 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico

Our voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting an emergency maintenance from 12 January 2024 at 09:00 PST until 12 January 2024 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Singapore phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2024 at 13:00 PST until 15 January 2024 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Costa Rica SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in Costa Rica is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 15 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2024 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Costa Rica handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

15 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 15 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
16 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 16 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
17 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 17 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
18 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 18 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
19 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 19 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
22 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 22 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
23 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2024 at 19:00 PST

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2024 at 21:00 PST until 16 January 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets via a subset of US Short Codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 January 2024 at 10:00 PST until 23 January 2024 at 22:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Networks

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 23 January 2024 at 02:00 PST until 23 January 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carrier networks.
